attributes.action: Place ventalin inhalers in First Aid boxes incase of emergencies.
attributes.background:
Asthma attacks are more common today as they were when I was a kid. 

I reckon that ventalin inhalers should be placed in first aid boxes incase someone forgets their inhaler and begins to have an asthma attack. It can be rare but being more prepared can save someone's life.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly where you would like these first aid boxes to be located e.g in schools
